author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/overwatch/

Let vengeance lead you to victory during Season 20: Vendetta!

A new villain steps into the spotlight with the arrival of our first official melee Damage Hero, Vendetta. With unmatched mobility, devastating close-range power, and a hunger for domination, Vendetta fights to reclaim her father’s legacy with deep ties to Talon and the next chapter of Overwatch 2’s global story.

Stadium levels up once again with Doomfist and Wuyang stepping into the arena, and the arrival of a brand new China Control map. We’re also giving players a rank reset and new rewards to chase as they keep climbing up the leaderboards.

Deck the halls as you brawl with the wintery cosmetics in the Season 20 Battle Pass. And with the 80 Mythic Prisms you’ll earn, bring some western flair to your festivities with the new Divine Desperado Cassidy Mythic Skin.

Winter Wonderland is back with a magical twist on a fan-favorite mode! Enjoy Mischief & Magic on a festive-theme
title: Overwatch 2 - Season 20: Vendetta Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/demon-slayer-kimetsu-no-yaiba-the-hinokami-chronicles-2/

His blade is set for vengeance. Zenitsu, as featured in Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infinity Castle, is now available as DLC!

Buy his character pack now to use him in VS Mode, or buy the "Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infinity Castle" Character Pass to get him plus other packs to be added in the coming months.
title: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 - Zenitsu Character Trailer | PS5 & PS4

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012485

The new BIG Winter Showcase trailer reveals more of Hela — a cozy adventure where you play as a tiny mouse helping a kind witch and the village she watches over. Explore lush Scandinavian-inspired landscapes, solve puzzles, and brew potions, solo or with friends in split-screen or online co-op.

Hela is coming to PlayStation®5 in 2026. Add it to your wishlist today!

#ps5 #ps5games #HelaTheGamE
title: Hela - Big Winter Showcase Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10010853/

Thief VR: Legacy of Shadow for PS VR2 will be available December 4th. pre-order now with 10% discount.

Developed by Maze Theory and published by Vertigo Games in cooperation with Eidos-Montréal, Thief VR: Legacy of Shadow marks the long-awaited return of the iconic Thief franchise, reimagined for immersive VR stealth on Playstation VR2.

Step into the shadows as Magpie, a cunning thief shaped by the streets, who steals as the only means to survive. That is, until you uncover something greater: a legendary artifact holding a legacy from the past.

Features:
• A Legendary Franchise Returns: Experience the world of Thief in VR for the first time, blending classic stealth gameplay with next-gen immersion.
• Master the Shadows: Stick to the darkness, evade patrols, and outmaneuver enemies with real-time stealth mechanics.
• Realistic Thieving: Pickpocket guards, pry open hidden compartments, and bypass locks with tactile VR interactions.
•
title: Thief VR: Legacy of Shadow - Launch Trailer | PS VR2 Games

Get bonus BlackCell Content including Operator Skin alternatives, Weapon Blueprints,  Loyalty Bonus, Daily Challenges, and more. 

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #cod #callofduty #blackops
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Season 01 BlackCell Battle Pass Upgrade | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011233

SLEEP AWAKE will be releasing on December 2nd, 2025. 

SLEEP AWAKE is out now on PS5 along with the full original soundtrack from Robin Finck of Nine Inch Nails.
In the last known city on Earth, people are disappearing in their sleep. Those who remain exist in a crisis of reckless experiments to keep awake. You must navigate depraved death cults, otherworldly forces, and the ever-present horror of The HUSH, to save yourself and those who rely upon you.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Sleep Awake - Out Now | PS5 Games
